the wish to harm or upset other people: There certainly wasn't any malice in her comments.formal I bear him no malice (= do not want to harm or upset him). with malice aforethought law
  specialized
To illegally harm someone with malice aforethought is to have thought about it and planned it before acting: Her crime was malicious and with malice aforethought.
